original_text:
And there I will give her her vineyards
    and make the Valley of Achor a door of hope.
And there she shall answer as in the days of her youth,
    as at the time when she came out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 거기서 비로소 그의 포도원을 그에게 주고 아골 골짜기로 소망의 문을 삼아 주리니 그가 거기서 응대하기를 어렸을 때와 애굽 땅에서 올라오던 날과 같이 하리라

sentences.original_text: I will give her her vineyards
and make the Valley of Achor a door of hope
as in the days of her youth
as at the time when she came out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 이집트 땅에서 나왔을 때와 같이
